title: shiva shakti jayakALi
sahitya:
shiva shakti jayakALi jayalakSmI vANi jagadIshvari 
Om sharaNam shrI varadAmbikE


anupallavi

  navarAtri kolu sEvai sheyum anbarellAm tavamum tiru 
vandanamum mighavOngit-tazhaittiDa aruLvAi


caraNam    ulaginil uyir anjak-kalakam sheiduNNum kolai pAvi asurarin
koDumaiyait-tIrAyO alai mOdum tuyarai vErAriDam muraiyiDuvOm 
abhayam abhayam abhayam raNa caNDI aruNOdaya sundari
